name: Natal rings True!
description: We have found ourselves the victors of the Third Boer War. The time has come to build up our new state.

name: The Native Question
description: Having achieved our independence, it is now time that we find a solution to the native issue.

name: Speak Softly
description: Instead of treating the natives harshly, it may work in our favour to attempt to work with them to provide peace and prosperity to Natal.

name: Work with Native Trade Unions
description: The native populations have set up many trade unions in order to better organize their struggle as a people. It would be wise to work with them.

name: Native Labour Regulation Act
description: Abuse of native labour has been extremely high in our nation. It is time to put an end to this and allow them to get a fair share of the wealth through their wages.

name: Recognize the Zulu Paramount Chief
description: The Zulu people have historically, always had their own chiefdoms and chiefs. While the government does not currently recognize any of them as legitimate, we have decided to take a step in that direction.

name: Collaborate with Dube
description: John Dube is a well known activist for native equal rights. While he is controversial, it would we wise for the government to collaborate with him.

name: State-Sponsored Native Education
description: The native population has lacked education for as long as we have been on the shores of Natal. It has been decided that the zulu peoples will get state-sponsored education to increase their overall welfare.

name: Establish the Native Council
description: The native population must have some form of representation in the government. That is why it has been decided to create the native council to guide and focus on the affairs of the native peoples.

name: Carry a Big Stick
description: The native population was a large problem in South Africa, and now, achieving our independence, that issue has been carried on to us. It has been decided that we are to suppress the native ambitions in order to secure our Anglo-Saxon state.

name: Suppress the ICU
description: The Industrial and Commercial Workers' Union has been a tool of the Internationale to undermine white rule in Natal and elsewhere in South Africa since its founding, hoping to lure the native population into the doctrines of syndicalism. It is time for us to push back!

name: Root Out Native Syndicalism
description: The native population and syndicalism have been completely intwined and an evil alliance. It is time to push back against this menace before it grows any larger.

name: The Asiatic Question
description: There is a large Indian population here in Natal, we must chose how to deal with this minority.

name: Frustrate Indian Business Ventures
description: Indian business has only caused us issues, they must be suppressed.

name: Provoke Indian-Zulu Antagonism
description: While cruel, pining the Zulus and the Indians against each other would certainly help weaken the two races.

name: Full Indian Immigration Stop
description: Indian immigration into Natal has only caused us problems. It's time we put it to a stop once and for all.

name: Suppress the Natal Indian Congress
description: The Natal Indian Congress is the primary Indian Natalian interest group, using tactics adopted from Indian demagogue Mahatma Gandhi to try and extort concessions from us. We must push them down if we want to secure our nation's stability.

name: Asiatic Land Tenure Act
description: The Indian population of Natal is endangering our white population with their entrepeneurial spirit. White store owners complain about the relatively cheap competition from the Indian neighbourhoods among both the Zulu and white customer base. We cannot leave them in the cold like this...

name: Establish the Indian Council
description: By establish an Indian council, our government would be better prepared to deal with any of the issues relating to our large Indian population.

name: Abolish Indian Pass Laws
description: Preventing Indian Natalians from entering certain places is counterproductive: it is only distorting the free market and by extension limiting our economic growth.

name: Indian Representation in Parliament
description: It is a natural right of all people to be represented in some form of government, it is about time that this right be granted to the Indians of Natal.

name: Open Higher Education to Indians
description: Higher education is a vital building block to a prosperous society, and every part of this society must have this opportunity.

name: Building a Nation
description: We have finally achieved independence for ourself. Now the long process of building a nation awaits us.

name: Pass the Natal Constitution Act
description: A constitution is vital for any sustainable form of government.

name: Welcome the British Influx
description: Our nation is built off British settlers, it never hurts to let more in.

name: Scrap the Use of Dutch
description: With the majority of the colonizers in the nation being of Anglo decent, there is no reason to keep Dutch around in our lands.

name: Embrace the Natal's British Identity
description: Natal is a nation of British descendance, and we should be proud of that.

name: Reform the Division into a Supreme Court
description: Now that Natal will go on on its own, we must reform the provincial division which previously was the highest provincial court in the land, into a genuine Supreme Court which will decide the fate of Natal's legal issues once and for all.

name: Separate the Natal Police
description: Going alone at it means that the Natal Police will have to be separated from the South African Police, as we can no longer rely on the instructions from Pretoria. The Natal Police Force shall henceforth be responsible to the Dominion government.

name: Seek Imperial Support
description: The imperial government in Canada is much needed to help to continue to build our new nation. It would be wise to request their support.

name: The National Reconstruction
description: Natal has been torn apart by war. Now that the cannons have ceased, it is our national responsibility to bring back Natal to its prewar prosperity.

name: Redirect IEDC Funds
description: The IEDC Funds for the Union had already been approved. Of course, Natal is significantly smaller than South Africa, but on the other hand we have been devastated for war as well. Let us petition the IEDC to redirect its planned funds to us instead, now that South Africa so narrow-mindedly decided to follow its own path.

name: Found a Central Bank
description: Using South African currency shall do no longer: this makes us dependent on South Africa and undermine the image of our independence and loyalty to the Empire. If we are to do this however, we will need to form a central monetary authority first however.

name: Issue the Natal Pound
description: With a Central Bank in place, it is time to replace all South African currency with one that is uniquely Natalian. No longer shall we be subjected to the monetary desires of Pretoria!

name: Invest in the Natal University College
description: The Natal University college is the largest public place for education in the nation. Let us invest in them to ensure our research capacity remains properly up to speed...

name: Encourage Cash Crop Farming
description: Cash Crop farming has been found to be extremely profitable all over the world. Should it be expanded, we will see our profits go through the roof.

name: Expand the Port of Durban
description: The Port of Durban, should it be expanded, would greatly improve our shipping capabilities.

name: Shipyards in Durban
description: By expanding our shipyards in Durban, we will be better able to expand our naval industries.

name: Trading with the Empire
description: In order to better improve our relations with the empire, it is only natural to expand our trade with them.

name: Improve the Train Lines
description: The train lines in Natal are in dire need of refurbishing, luckily, we know how to get that done.

name: Expand Newcastle's Steelmills
description: It is known that there is a great amount of steel in Newcastle, should we expand our operations there, we might find more steel.

name: Develop Newcastle's Industry
description: The industry in Newcastle must be expanded upon in order to help grow our production in the region. This new industry will aid us greatly for producing armaments for any future war we might face.

name: Found the NBC
description: With South Africa gone the SABC is no longer applicable to Natal either. Let us build our own national radio broadcasting corporation which will serve as the voice of the government towards the people...

name: Trade with Mozambique
description: Our northern neighbor is rich with resources, trading with them could be extremely beneficial.

name: Third Boer War
description: The despicable Boers have risen up and turned their back on their fellow European brethren. With South Rhodesia now having succeed from the "Republic", we men of Natal shall to rise up and with the support of the Entente, put these farmers back in their place.

name: Refugees from the Eastern Cape
description: In the chaos, Anglo civilians have began to flee towards Natal from the Eastern Cape, with many young men willing to take up arms against the Boers that harry them.

name: British Indian Support
description: With a request made by the Natal Indian Council to British India to assist in fighting back the Boers, both the Government and especially Council wait for abated breath for the response.

name: Entente Support
description: With the Entente forces now making it to the shores of Durban. The forces of Natal are now able to push the Boer back and reclaim South Africa as ours.

name: Port Defence
description: Durban port is the life blood of Natal and must be defended accordingly.

name: Anti Air Installation
description: With Natal having little to no aeroplanes, the need to air defence is greater then ever. With the finding off old but still usable naval QF-3 guns, have been installed to defend Durban from Boer air raids.

name: Requisite Merchant Ships
description: Natal have enact war measures akin to those used by the British in the German named Weltkrieg, have order that all civilian ships fitting their desired specifications are to be requested by the state forthwith

name: First Shipment
description: It appears through a lot of string pulling and favours, that Ottawa has managed to secure some basic provisions for our fight. Though we are in desperate need for more, beggars can't be choosers

name: Secure the Means
description: Further war measures have been enacted with all workshops, metalworks and any other industry fit for the production of arms have been requested by the state.

name: Enforce Curfew
description: To defend our citizens, they must make sacrifices to ensure their safety. With curfews and random stop checks by Natal Police, we will ensure that no Boer will find his way into Natal

name: State Driven Economy
description: In these desperate times, the Government has sort to enact further war time measures, with directly controlling the the nation's economy.

name: Secure Supply Lines
description: With War Measures emplaced, further focus has been given to ensure that supplies are making it to the front, unmolested by the insidious Boer

name: Natal Stands Triumphs
description: The war is over, though we have not recovered South Africa completely. We have secured our independence and now must pick up the pieces and rebuild

name: The Zulu Question
description: Unlike the Natal Indians, the Zulu's remained somewhat neutral during the Third Boer War. Now Natal must decide if it will arm it's native population or impose other means.

name: Motorize the Cavalry
description: With modern problems, come modern solutions. The Canadian designed "GM Canada CMP" has been picked to replace the

name: Canadian Standardization
description: Natal has obtained the latest Canadian Rifles and acquired licencees to ensure a level of standardization is obtained lessening the burden on supply chains.

name: Natal's Heavy Tank Industry
description: During the Third Boer War, the Natal Government had total control of the nation's economy and resources. Now that the country is independent, the Government's strangle hold on the economy has been released, though certain industries have been kept. Mainly those evolving around the production of heavy tanks.

name: Big Guns
description: Lessons from the Third Boer War has shown that artillery is still god on the battlefield, with Natal setting to acquire the latest artillery designs from Canada and other Entente forces

name: Natal Carbineer Regiment
description: The Natal Carbineers, originally a reserve regiment, distinguished itself in the Third Boer War earning a level of elite status amongst the Natal Forces. With this in mind, the regiment has been allowed a level of autonomy, allowing it to implement it's own training regimes and recruitment standards

name: Elite Army Doctrine
description: The "Accepted" Natal manpower pool has resulted in Natal having to rethink how it will assist Canada in it's efforts to retake the Home Isles. With this in mind and taking a page from the Carbineers, the Army seeks to expand it's elite regiments to make the most of it's limited manpower pool.

name: Mobile Army Doctrine
description: SFR_Mobile_Army

name: Royal Natal Army
description: Independent, reformed and ready for what lies on the horizon. Natal Army has officially been given the honourific of "Royal" by the King himself and stands with it's Entente allies to strike at the Syndicalist threat and remove it once and for all.

name: Expanding the Native Labour Scheme
description: With the need to free up manpower where they can. The Army has opted to expand the Native Labour Battalions, with Natives given more roles that are of a non-combative nature to free up "Accepted" manpower to the front lines. Though this will severely hurt the newly formed African Rifle Battalions as Native loyalty will be hard to find.

name: Aviation Reforms
description: The Natal Air Wing currently only made up of several monoplanes from the Weltkrieg and the odd trainer here and there. Canada has offered to send Natal several squadrons worth of aeroplanes in a land lease contract

name: Close Air Support Doctrine
description: The cheaper, more agile fighter bomber designs allow for Natal's airwing to provide greater support to it's ground forces, though reduces it's role as an independent branch

name: Tactical Bomber Doctrine
description: The more expensive, less agile tactical bomber allow the Natal airwings to provide a greater volume of firepower to the ground forces, though at a cost of inter branch communication.

name: Canadian Radar Installations
description: With the need of early warning systems, Canada has offered to install Nata's first Radar Installation in the region. This will provide Natal the much needed defence it needs to defend it's shores and aid Entente forces.

name: Natal Paratroopers
description: With the Army adopting the doctrine of an smaller Elite Army. The Airforce has opted to form a paratrooper regiment, to work in unison with Canadian forces in their efforts in recapturing the Home Isles

name: Cargo Planes
description: With little aviation industry, Natal must secure cargo planes to it's paratroopers via Canada. Though this will come at a cost, it will provide Natal another arrow in it's quiver against it's foe

name: Greater Air Support Coordination
description: With the Army adopting the a more mobile approach, the Natal Airwings have had to adapt to this change with a greater focus on coordination between the two branches. This has resulted a more elite cadre of pilots.

name: Integrated Air Recon
description: With greater coordination between the Air and Army branches of the Natal's armed forces, the use of Scout Planes has become the backbone of these coordination. With eyes in the sky, relaying information to provide commanders better planning and strategies against the enemy forces.

name: Royal Natal Airforce
description: With new planes, new doctrines, and a new culture installed in the newly dubbed Royal Natal Airforce, it is more ready to defend Natal's borders and assist the Entente in it's struggle against the Syndicalist threat.

name: Remnants of the South African Navy
description: With more or less the entire South African Fleet changing colours to hoist the Union Jack over the Prinsenvlag, has left Natal with a fairly large fleet for it's size and lacking the facilities to maintain them. With Entente investment, the Government aims to rectify this.

name: Coast Guard Reserves
description: With manpower forever being an issue of Natal, the creation of a Coast Guard Reserve is designed to allow those to elderly or unfit for frontline service. This has caused some controversy, with non-whites also allowed to join, but has been alleviated with non-white unable to command white forces.

name: Retrofitting Scheme
description: Lacking the means to produce ships by any great means, Natal has taken the approach of retrofitting modern weapon systems on older naval chassis. Though this isn't always going to be an option, it's a stop-gap measure that will greatly assist Natal's newly obtained Navy and not drain what little revenue it has.

name: Naval Bomber Command
description: With the Airforce focusing on greater coordination with ground forces, the Navy has opted to form it's on independent Naval Bomber airwing. This has allowed for greater coordination and the ability to provide Naval bombing strikes, where they are sorely needed.

name: Greater Reach
description: Though Natal's Navy only mission is the protection of Entente shipping lanes around the Cape, the need to be able to strike around Africa will be sorely needed in the future ahead.

name: Hallifax at the Helm
description: With Hallifax defecting to Natal in it's time of need, has taken the helm of the Natal's Navy and begun implementing his ideas. This is mainly expanding on the current focus of the Navy, with defending the coast line of Natal and the Cape, along with supporting the possible war effort against the Syndicalist in Europe

name: Destroyer Focus
description: With the threat of submarines, comes the advancement of Destroyer Chassis to hunt for the new wolves of the sea. With the latest Entente designs, the Natal Navy can deal with these threats and become the new hunter's of Cape.

name: Royal Natal Navy
description: Though coming from more then humble origins, the now dubbed Royal Natal Navy has come into it's own. Though not a large Navy by any feat, it can still provide South Africa's original goal of defending the Cape against any who threat the Entente and Natal's interests

name: Natal's Contribution to the Great Crusade
description: Though being dubbed the "Northern Ireland of Africa", the Natal Armed Forces stand ready to assist Canada in it's Great Crusade in reclaiming the Home Isles and being rid of the Syndicalist beast that strangles it.
